Jokowi Dinilai Hanya Cari Alasan Tak Terbitkan Perppu KPK karena Gugatan MK
03 Nov 2019, 07:52 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Menteri Sekretaris Negara (Mensesneg) Pratikno menyebut Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menghargai proses uji materi UU KPK di Mahkamah Konstitusi (MK) dan tidak mencampuradukkan dengan Peraturan Pemerintah Pengganti Undang-Undang (Perppu) KPK. Pernyataan tersebut dinilai Pusat Kajian Antikorupsi (Pukat) UGM sebagai alasan untuk tidak segera menerbitkan Perppu KPK.
"Saya kira presiden nampaknya mencari-cari alasan saja ya. Alasan itu juga tidak tepat. Justru secara hukum, alasan seperti itu sangat tidak tepat. Justru bisa mengaburkan esensi hukum itu sendiri. Kita tidak tahu juga apa ini dalam rangka mengulur-ulur waktu lalu masyarakat lupa," kata Ketua Pukat UGM Oce Madril saat dihubungi, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam.
Oce menuturkan proses uji materi di MK bisa berjalan sendiri-sendiri dengan Perppu KPK. Jokowi dinilainya bisa mengeluarkan Perppu KPK dalam keadaan memaksa.
"Sebenarnya proses juudicial review tidak kaitannya, itu kan berjalan sendiri-sendiri ya. Peppu itu adalah kewenangannya presiden selama memang situasinya memaksa sehingga presiden bisa mengeluarkan Perppu," tutur Oce.
Oce mengatakan seandainya Perppu KPK tetap akan bisa berlaku sebelum ada keputusan MK. Dia menilai Perppu tersebut tidak akan terintervensi dengan keputusan dari MK.
"Saya cukup meyakini, JR ini atau UU ini, tidak akan diotak-atik oleh Mahmaka Konstitusi," ucapnya.

Jokowi Judged Only to Find Reasons for Not Issuing Perppu on KPK because of Court's Lawsuit
03 Nov 2019, 07:52 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Minister of State Secretary (Menesneg) Pratikno said President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) respected the KPK Law material review process in the Constitutional Court (MK) and did not confuse it with the Government Regulation in lieu of the KPK Act. The statement was assessed by the UGM Anti-Corruption Study Center as a reason for not immediately issuing a KPPU Perppu.
"I think the president seems to be looking for an excuse, yes. That reason is also incorrect. In fact, legally, such reasons are very inaccurate. It can actually obscure the essence of the law itself. people forget, "said UGM Oce Madril Trawler Chairman when contacted on Saturday (11/02/2019) night.
Oce said that the material testing process at the Constitutional Court could run independently with the KPPU Perppu. Jokowi was judged to be able to issue a KPPU Perppu in a forced condition.
"Actually the juudicial review process is not related, it runs independently. Peppu is the authority of the president as long as the situation is forced so that the president can issue a Perppu," Oce said.
Oce said if the KPPU Perppu would still be able to take effect before there was a MK decision. He considered the Perppu would not be intervened with a decision from the Court.
"I am quite sure, this JR or this Act, will not be tampered with by the Constitutional Mahmaka," he said.
